message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $11,000 is a good starting point, but I'm really looking to spend closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to come down a bit?

Hi Bob, I understand your desire to get the product at a lower price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
